Klasse Dashboard

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.Composite<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout>
com.spirit.application.views.dashboard.Dashboard
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, Serializable
@Route(value="dashboard", layout=MainLayout.class) @Menu(order=0.0) @PermitAll public class Dashboard extends com.vaadin.flow.component.Composite<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout>
A view class for displaying the dashboard of job posts. This class provides functionality for filtering, searching, and displaying job posts. It also allows viewing detailed information of each job post in a dialog.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Dashboard

      @Autowired public Dashboard(JobPostService jobPostService)
      Constructor for initializing the dashboard view with the provided job post service. It fetches job posts and initializes the search bar and filter options.
      Parameter:
      jobPostService - The service to fetch job posts from the backend.

  • Methodendetails

    • searchbar

      public com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.HorizontalLayout searchbar(List<String> employmentTypes, List<String> locationTypes, List<String> companyNameTypes, List<String> jobTitleTypes)
      Creates the search bar for the dashboard which includes a text search field and filter selections.
      Parameter:
      employmentTypes - the list of unique employment types.
      locationTypes - the list of unique location types.
      companyNameTypes - the list of unique company names.
      jobTitleTypes - the list of unique job titles.
      Gibt zurück:
      A horizontal layout containing the search bar with filters.

    • createCard

      public com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout createCard(JobPostDTO jobPost)
      Creates a vertical card layout for displaying a job post with its details.
      Parameter:
      jobPost - the job post to display in the card.
      Gibt zurück:
      a vertical layout containing the job post details.
